p: The liver and brain were removed after perfusion of animals and were further fixed for 48 h in 4% paraformaldehyde in 10 mM PBS (pH 7.4). The tissues are embedded with paraffin, and coronal sections of 5 ÂµM thickness were cut for staining of hematoxylin and eosin (H & E). The sections were examined under the microscope for any abnormality and the dead cells in each group.
